results.creator_credit: Wendy Campbell, Helen Gaynor and Gaynor Productions
results.brief_description: A day in the life of a muddle-minded trombone player. Cast includes Steve Kearney, Tracey Harvey, Ross Thompson, Earnie Bourne, John Thompson, Simon Thorpe, Tony Rickard, Helene Jacoby.

results.title: The Trombone
results.creator_credit: Muir Mathieson, Ken Cameron, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids, World Mirror-Realist Films and Anvil Film and Recording Group
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “We Make Music”
Alfred Flaszynski describes the history of the trombone, its development and the technique of playing, illustrated by excerpts from Ravel’s Bolero and George Lohmann’s Posaune Teufel. The problems of selecting each note by the correct use of the slide and the appropriate harmonic series are dealt with in detail.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Muir Mathieson, Ken Cameron, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids, World Mirror-Realist Films and Anvil Film and Recording Group

results.title: The Trojan women
results.brief_description: A joint Greek and American production based on Euripedes’ play “The Trojan women”. Katharine Hepburn is Hecube, the wife of King Priam; Vanessa Redgrave is Andromache, the widow of Hector; Genevieve Bujold is Cassandra, the cursed prophetess of Apollo and Trojan Princess and Irene Papas is the beautiful Helen of Troy. The victors of the Trojan war ransack the city and take as part of their spoils, the women and children. The play tells of their bitter struggle to survive the cruelty of defeat and capture.

The victors of the Trojan war ransack the city and take as part of their spoils, the women and children. The play tells of their bitter struggle to survive the cruelty of defeat and capture.

results.title: The Triple jump
results.creator_credit: Dr Frank Ryan and Ryan Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Track and Field Instruction”
The technique of the triple jump, sometimes known as the hop, step and jump, is shown in normal and slow motion speeds. Training and preparation techniques for achieving success in this event from the beginner stage are also shown.

results.title: The Trip (K)
results.creator_credit: Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
results.brief_description: Louie is lonely when he moves out of his neighbourhood - so he constructs an imaginary world in a shoe box and flies off in his toy plane to visit old friends. The adventure helps Louie discover that friends are friends wherever you are. Based on the book by Ezra Jack Keats. Narrated by Charles Turner.

results.title: The Trip
results.brief_description: It’s Halloween and Louie is sad because his family has moved to a new neighbourhood and he doesn’t know anyone there. Left to play alone, Louise paints a scene in a shoebox and imagines himself back in his old street with his old friends, having wonderful adventures. Based on the book by Ezra Jack Keats and narrated by Charles Turner.

results.title: The Tribe
results.creator_credit: Hubert Bals Fund, Ukrainian State Film Agency, Myroslav Slaboshpytskyi, Vlad Odudenko and Olena Hres
results.brief_description: A film told entirely through sign language, The Tribe has a unique soundscape, shocking scenes and humanity.

constellations_other.name: Significant sounds
constellations_other.description: The arrival of synchronised sound dramatically changed the movie business, allowing filmmakers to use sound in new and exciting ways which developed the use sound into own film language.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Hubert Bals Fund, Ukrainian State Film Agency, Myroslav Slaboshpytskyi, Vlad Odudenko and Olena Hres
results.description: Deaf mute Sergey enters a specialized boarding school for deaf-and-dumb. In this new place, he needs to find his way through the hierarchy of the school’s network dealing with crimes and prostitution, the Tribe. By taking part of several robberies, he gets propelled higher into the organization. Then he meets one of the Chief’s concubines Anya, and unwillingly breaks all the unwritten rules of the tribe.
description_for_label: Deaf mute Sergey enters a specialized boarding school for deaf-and-dumb. results.title: The Triangular arm splint
results.creator_credit: United States. Dept. of the Navy
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “First Aid for Fractures”
Demonstrates step by step how to apply a triangular arm splint, and shows how it is employed in combination with a single padded basswood splint for fractures of the upper or lower arm.

results.title: The Trials of Zanzibar
results.creator_credit: Alan Segal, Stephen Clarke and Granada International Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”
Reports on political trials being held in Zanzibar where the accused are refused defence counsel and the prosecution admits that some of the evidence was obtained under torture. Includes an interview with Zanzibar’s Attorney-General and Aboud Jumbe, Zanzibar’s Head of State
